newsitem.title: USA: Expert to ship McDonaldLand computer games.
newsitem.headline: Expert to ship McDonaldLand computer games.

text.p: Expert Software Inc on Monday said it would begin shipping computer games based on McDonald Corp's characters in the third quarter.
The McDonaldLand brand software is a key part of Expert's strategy to revive its sales growth, said Ken Currier, Expert's chief executive.

Referring to McDonald's, Currier said: "Their brand awareness among both parents and kids is going to help our revenue grow significantly." He was speaking to investors at the Hambrecht & Quist Technology Conference in San Francisco.
In January, Expert Software, a publisher of inexpensive computer games, said it would work with McDonald's to write games featuring Ronald McDonald, Grimace and the Early Bird.
Currier said Expert would sell the products through its traditional distribution channels -- retail stores -- beginning in the third quarter.
In recent quarters, Expert's revenue has shrunk because of increased competition for shelf space at retailers.
